author: Alemas
title: Stand back; this car is a mechanized rhino!
review:
Excuse the pun above... anyways, this car has an interesting feature: it can go in "off-road" mode(pictured above), or lock it into "street" mode, which makes the car lower to suit the mean streets of the Drome! It even has a slammer! Now, onto the pros and cons:

Pros:

Nice features
Street mode
Off-road mode
Cool tyres
Slammer

Cons:

Rubber bands break easily

Overall, a ferocious set! In other words, a great set!
